name: Scottie Pippen
description: 6'8" small forward, ultimate sidekick who was a superstar. 6 championships, 7x All-Defense. Long arms, suffocating D, underrated playmaker.

lockdown-defense.name: Lockdown Defense
lockdown-defense.description: Full-court press, arms spread, denying everything
lockdown-defense.prompt: in elite defensive stance full-court pressing ball handler - incredibly long arms spread wide, knees bent, eyes locked on opponent's chest, suffocating on-ball defense that made stars disappear

coast-to-coast.name: Coast to Coast
coast-to-coast.description: Rebound to dunk without a dribble stop
coast-to-coast.prompt: sprinting coast to coast with ball after rebound - long strides covering huge ground, ball in one hand, about to finish with powerful dunk, the point-forward running the break

poster-dunk.name: Posterizing Ewing
poster-dunk.description: The dunk over Patrick Ewing - standing over him after
poster-dunk.prompt: rising over defender for powerful two-handed dunk - dunking directly over or through taller opponent, face showing fierce determination, about to stand over victim, signature poster moment
poster-dunk.energy: poster material, baptizing the big man

passing-vision.name: Point Forward Vision
passing-vision.description: Threading the needle pass, seeing the whole court
passing-vision.expression: court vision, seeing what others can't
passing-vision.prompt: delivering no-look or thread-the-needle pass - ball leaving hands at unusual angle, eyes looking elsewhere, complete court vision, the underrated playmaker in action

migraine-game.name: Migraine Game
migraine-game.description: Playing through migraine in Finals - grimacing but dominant
migraine-game.prompt: playing through visible pain - hand to head between plays, grimacing but still competing, warrior who wouldn't quit despite migraine, toughness personified

arms-up-celebration.name: Championship Celebration
arms-up-celebration.description: Arms raised after another Bulls championship
arms-up-celebration.prompt: both arms raised in championship celebration - smile of pure joy, confetti falling, celebrating alongside teammates, the essential partner finally getting his due
